Header: Trump makes final bid for votes
Content: US President Donald Trump has made a last bid for voters to back the Republican party on the eve of the mid-term election. “Everything we have achieved is at stake tomorrow,” he said during a blitz of three final rallies. The nationwide vote on Tuesday is being seen as a referendum on his presidency. His ability to govern in the final two years of his term will hinge upon the outcome. Americans are going to the polls to vote on all 435 seats in the House, 35 of the 100 Senate seats and dozens of state governors.
